verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}City, oh City, oh City of God, Glorious things are spoken of You. City, oh City, oh City of God, Glorious things are spoken of You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Singers and dancers together say, “All my springs of joy are in You.” Singers and dancers together say, “All my springs of joy are in You.”{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
